attributes.action: OMIT OR REIMBURSE NURSING REGISTRATION CHARGES
attributes.additional_details: FRONTLINE WORKERS WORKING THROUGH THIS CRISIS DO NOT NEED ANY ADDED FINANCIAL PRESSURE
attributes.background:
My mum has just had to pay £100 for scrubs because the hospital don't have enough, she now has to pay £120 to remain a registered nurse

WHY SHOULD THEY PAY FOR THEIR OWN CLOTHING BECAUSE IT IS UNAVAILABLE!!!!

 WHY AREN'T WE LOOKING AFTER OUR OWN BRITISH NATIONAL PROFESSIONALS???
